System requirements: 
- Processor x86 or x64 with a clock speed of 1 GHz and supports a set of instructions SSE2 
- 2 GB RAM - 3 GB of free hard disk space - 1280 x 800 - to use graphics hardware acceleration, you need a graphics card that supports DirectX 10 
- Windows 10, Windows 8.x , Windows 7, SP1, Windows 10 Server, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2008 R2 
- Requires .NET 3.5. For some of the components may also be required to install .NET 4.0 or 4.5 CLR 

Description: the Microsoft Office 2016 - a new version of the office suite Microsoft Office, which seeks to combine the aesthetic changes and improving the interface 2013 with an online service capabilities Office 365. 
In addition, new features were added in response to customer needs, as well as improved performance of the package as a whole. 
the Microsoft Office 2016 well demonstrates how today has changed the approach to create documents and work with them. Many of us are beginning to work on the same computer, 
it continues on the other, as demonstrated in the third, simultaneously managing to make minor changes for laptop, tablet or smartphone. Therefore, Office 2016 tried to make conceptually different. 
Almost all of the key elements in it have been developed from scratch, and applications oriented to a single style of work, regardless of the hardware platform. They are designed to provide the usual functional on any device, 
automatically adjusting its interface to the parameters of the current screen and the available system resources. View, edit and analyze data, and develop presentations with coordinated familiar interface that is optimized for your device. 
Documents look great on the PC and on a Mac, and mobile devices.

Package
This package includes the following products in Russian and English for 32-bit (x86) and 64-bit (x64) core:

2016 Microsoft Visio Viewer

dditional Information
By default, if you initiate the installation via setup.exe in the root of the drive will be installed 32-bit versions of the products. To install the 64-bit version, you must run the installation via setup.exe in the folder x64.

To install than the entire package Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2016, but only certain programs from it, in the installer, following the license agreement, click the "Settings" ( Customize) and in the "Installation Options" (Installation Options) disconnect the unit unneeded applications.

To add to the installation of a second language in the installer, following the license agreement, click "Setting" (Customize) and in the "Language" ( Language) tick a second language.

To switch the interface language installed software package Office family in 2016, has in the asset several languages, including "the Microsoft Office 2016" (Office 2016 Tools), select "Language Settings Microsoft Office 2016" (Office 2016 Language Options ) and set with the help of this utility required language as the default language. You can also remove a second language, one that is not the default language.
